summary: The Broadband Buildout Accountability Act (H.R. 1579) aims to increase transparency in the Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment Program. It mandates that actions and decisions made by the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information regarding this program be subject to the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA). The bill seeks to hold the agency accountable for its broadband buildout initiatives, promoting openness in its operations.
